title: Celebrity Coach Trip's Kate Lawler shows devastating flooding outside her Finsbury Park home

Celebrity Coach Trip star Kate Lawler has taken to social media to share an insight on the devastating effects of a burst water pipe in Finsbury Park, London.

The 39-year-old Presenter and DJ captured the disastrous scenes as gushing water flooded the London neighbourhood and left desperate residents frantically trying to stop rising waters from entering their homes on Tuesday.

Kate posted her homemade video to Twitter alongside the caption: "This road is opposite my flat. I can’t believe a burst pipe has caused so much damage. Thinking of the poor people’s homes that are affected. What a nightmare. FinsburyPark."

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

(Image: @katelawler /Twitter)

Residents have been seen wading through water in wellies, while cars have been submerged in the murky water.

London Fire Brigade said 12 fire engines and 80 firefighters were called to the scene, with a number of properties flooded.

(Image: @katelawler /Twitter)

(Image: @katelawler /Twitter)

Singing sensation Beverley Knight quickly commented on Kate's video which showed the London street covered by high volumes of water.

She replied: "Luv I am the other side of the Finsbury Park and luckily for us, we only have the inconvenience of no water in our pipes. Those poor residents. It’s awful. Xxx."

Kate responded: "No way Beverley! Yeh luckily for us we were just without water this morning. It's back on now. People's homes are flooded :-( xx."

(Image: @katelawler /Twitter)

(Image: @katelawler /Twitter)

Kate's devastating video was viewed by 24.7k Twitter users, with many rushing to the comments section to offer their sympathy and provide support for those affected.

Hours later, Kate took to her Instagram stories to tell worried fans that she was 'okay' and showed her kitchen tap working again, once the water had been restored.

The Celebrity Coach Trip star also revealed her 'miniatures', her two dogs Baxter and Shirley, were safe.

(Image: @katelawler /Twitter)

The former Big Brother winner recently made headlines when she confessed she is judged for not wanting to have a baby and has previously felt there is 'something wrong with her'.

Kate previously revealed that fiance Martin, who she calls Boj, really wants to have children but she has never had a maternal instinct.

The pair have started a podcast, Maybe Baby, top open up a discussion and break the taboo surrounding not wanting to have kids.

Kate currently stars in the new series of Celebrity Coach Trip, which returned to E4 on October 7.

Kate teams up with her good mate Arron Crascall, who went viral for his catchphrases "see ya later" and "HASTA LA VISTA, BABY!!!!"

*Watch Celebrity Coach Trip weekdays at 7.30pm on E4
description: The former Big Brother winner revealed the disastrous effects of a burst pipe in London's Finsbury Park
